title: "Sense Photonics Jumps Into Self-Driving Fray With New Sensor Technology"
excerpt: "Sense Photonics has developed new detection technology that hits a key milestone required for self-driving cars, the laser sensor company said on Friday. The company led by automotive industry veteran and former Google executive Shauna McIntyre is developing a lidar sensor that uses laser light to help autonomous vehicles gain a three-dimensional view of the road."
